price: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa kun kasance kuna gũrin mutuwa tun a gabãnin ku haɗu da ita, to lalle ne kun gan ta,* alhãli kuwa kuna kallo.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ تَمَنَّوۡنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَلۡقَوۡهُ فَقَدۡ رَأَيۡتُمُوهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ
footnotes: * Mutuwa watau, kunã gũrin wani yãƙi a bãyan na Badar yã zo.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad kuntum tamannawna al-mawta min qabli an talqawhu faqad ra-aytumūhu wa-antum tanẓurūna
